Class EnquiryRepo

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.repositories.EnquiryRepo
All Implemented Interfaces:
RepoInterface<EnquiryModel,Integer>
public class EnquiryRepo extends Object implements RepoInterface<EnquiryModel,Integer>
Manages the storage and retrieval of enquiry data. Implements the RepoInterface for standard repository operations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<EnquiryModel>
    enquiries
    In-memory list to store all enquiry instances.

      public EnquiryRepo()

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save(EnquiryModel enquiry)
      Saves or updates an enquiry in the repository. If an enquiry with the same ID exists, it replaces the existing one. Otherwise, it adds the new enquiry to the list.
      Specified by:
      save in interface RepoInterface<EnquiryModel,Integer>
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The EnquiryModel object to save or update.

    • findAll

      public List<EnquiryModel> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all enquiries currently stored in the repository.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface RepoInterface<EnquiryModel,Integer>
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing all EnquiryModel objects.

    • findByID

      public EnquiryModel findByID(Integer enquiryID)
      Finds an enquiry by its unique Enquiry ID. Iterates through the list to find a match.
      Specified by:
      findByID in interface RepoInterface<EnquiryModel,Integer>
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to find.
      Returns:
      The found EnquiryModel object, or null if no enquiry matches the ID.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(Integer enquiryID)
      Description copied from interface: RepoInterface
      Deletes an item from the repository using its unique ID.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface RepoInterface<EnquiryModel,Integer>
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The unique ID of the item to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the item was found and deleted, false otherwise.

    • findByID

      public EnquiryModel findByID(int enquiryID)
      Find an enquiry by its unique Enquiry ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to find.
      Returns:
      The found enquiry, or null if no enquiry has that ID.

    • saveEnquiry

      public EnquiryModel saveEnquiry(EnquiryModel enquiry)

      Parameters:

    • findByApplicantNRIC

      public List<EnquiryModel> findByApplicantNRIC(String nric)
      Find all enquiries by applicant NRIC
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      List of enquiries associated with the applicant

    • findByProjectID

      public List<EnquiryModel> findByProjectID(int projectID)
      Find all enquiries by project ID
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      List of enquiries associated with the project
